operations.summary: Returns a list of all Log Retention Policy objects

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: SCIM filter

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies a property value by which to sort

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Specifies either ascending or descending alphabetical order

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of the first result to return

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Indicates the number of results per page

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

operations.summary: Add a new Log Retention Policy to the config

parameters.description: Log Retention Policy to add
parameters.name: add-log-retention-policy-request
attributes

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

parameters.name: applyChangeTo

add-log-retention-policy-request.description: A Log Retention Policy resource request

policyName.description: Name of the new Log Retention Policy

numberOfFiles.description: Specifies the number of archived log files to retain before the oldest ones are cleaned.

diskSpaceUsed.description: Specifies the maximum total disk space used by the log files.

retainDuration.description: Specifies the desired minimum length of time that each log file should be retained.

description.description: A description for this Log Retention Policy

freeDiskSpace.description: Specifies the minimum amount of free disk space that should be available on the file system on which the archived log files are stored.

log-retention-policy-response.description: A Log Retention Policy resource response

id.description: Name of the Log Retention Policy

numberOfFiles.description: Specifies the number of archived log files to retain before the oldest ones are cleaned.

diskSpaceUsed.description: Specifies the maximum total disk space used by the log files.

retainDuration.description: Specifies the desired minimum length of time that each log file should be retained.

description.description: A description for this Log Retention Policy

freeDiskSpace.description: Specifies the minimum amount of free disk space that should be available on the file system on which the archived log files are stored.
